title: Chip Architect
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish! As a member of our dynamic group, you will have the unique and rewarding opportunity to craft upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of Apple's customers every single day.
description: This role involves interaction with many cross-functional and multi-disciplinary teams including hardware, software and system engineers. Being able to work in a collaborative manner with cross-functional teams is essential. - Architecture and Micro-architecture specification definition for upcoming SOCs - Work with cross-functional teams to set SOC requirements - Explore new approaches aligned with emerging technologies, competitive performance requirements, and critical system constraints - Perform feasibility analysis including SoC area, performance and power estimates - Guide an efficient system/hardware/software architecture to meet product requirements - Assess and guide system integration feasibility, feature and implementation trade-offs
key_qualifications: BS and 20+ years of relevant industry experience. Experience in the areas of Wireless technologies such as WiFi and BT architecture and implementation experience is highly desirable. Must have a thorough understanding of SoC, WiFi PHY, WiFi MAC and system architecture fundamentals, backed with substantial experience. This includes the following fields: Power and performance trade-offs, system states definition including idle and dynamic power states, Microprocessor Subsystems, Memory Controllers, Interconnect protocols and topologies, External interfaces topologies and trade-offs, the Hardware-software partitioning considerations, SoC data and control flows definition, Digital ASIC flows and Debug methodologies, Excellent communication skills across organizations and at the executive level, Excellent written skills for clear and concise reporting, Experience in Digital ASIC design or verification is an advantage
education_experience: BS and 20+ years of relevant industry experience.
